actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1901(a) of title 38, United States Code, to make certain veterans of World War I eligible for the automobile assistance allowance provided for certain veterans of World War II and the Korean conflict.

summary.text: Makes disabled veterans of World War I eligible for the automobile assistance allowance provided for veterans of World War II and the Korean conflict. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1901 (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1901(a) of title 38, United States Code, to make certain veterans of World War I eligible for the automobile assistance allowance provided for certain veterans of World War II and the Korean conflict.
